description: Playing as any faction, complete the main campaign, with the difference between the influence of the faction leader and the current lowest influence of any other character being never greater than 4 points.

description: Playing as any faction, complete the main campaign having turned all your enemies into vassal kingdoms.

description: Playing as any faction, ensure that every characters loyalty remains above 1 for the entire campaign.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_MARRY_THEN_DESTROY
description: Playing as any faction, marry a rival king's daughter and then destroy his faction through conquest.

description: Playing as any faction, play and win a battle whilst heavily outnumbered.

description: Playing as any faction, complete the main campaign without any rebellions or usurpers challenging your rule.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_VICTORY_ENGLISH_MECHANICS

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_VICTORY_GAELIC_MECHANICS
description: Playing as any of the Gaelic kingdoms, annex all surviving Gaelic factions.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_VICTORY_VIKING_ARMY_MECHANICS
description: Playing as the Great Viking Army, complete the main campaign while keeping both the English and the Army happy at all times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_VICTORY_VIKING_SEA_MECHANICS
description: Playing as the Viking Sea Kings, reach the maximum possible tribute level.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_OWN_ALL_SAINT_BUILDINGS
description: Playing as any faction, own all of the Saints' buildings on the campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_OWN_ALL_LONGPHORTS_AND_VIKING_PORTS
description: Playing as any faction, own all Longphort and Viking Port buildings on the campaign map.
